pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bayesian Non-Homogeneous Markov and Mixture Models for Multiple Time Series // Holsclaw, Greene, Robertson, and Smyth (2017) doi:10.1214/16-AOAS1009. Bayesian HMM and NHMM modeling for multiple time series. The emission distribution can be mixtures of Exponential, Gamma, Poisson, or Normal distributions, and zero inflation is possible.
